attributes.title: Max TV Equipment
attributes.field_meta_title: Max TV Equipment | Premium Set-Top Boxes & Devices
attributes.field_meta_description: Explore our premium Max TV equipment including 4K set-top boxes, streaming devices, and accessories.

attributes.field_hero_subtitle: State-of-the-art devices for the ultimate entertainment experience

field_features.title: Max TV 4K Box
field_features.description: Ultra HD 4K set-top box with voice remote and advanced features

field_features.title: Streaming Stick Pro
field_features.description: Compact streaming device for any HDMI-enabled TV

field_features.title: Voice Remote Pro
field_features.description: Advanced voice-controlled remote with backlit keys

field_features.title: Wireless Mini Box
field_features.description: Wireless receiver for additional rooms without cable runs

field_content_blocks.title: Technical Specifications
field_content_blocks.content: Our Max TV equipment features the latest technology including 4K HDR support, Dolby Atmos audio, voice control, and seamless wireless connectivity. Each device is designed for easy installation and optimal performance.

field_content_blocks.title: Installation & Support
field_content_blocks.content: Professional installation available for all equipment. Our certified technicians ensure optimal setup and provide comprehensive training on device features. 24/7 technical support included with all equipment.
